steps.title: Act out your favorite romantic scene with me.
steps.content: Act out your favorite romantic scene with me. If you want to play truth or dare without revealing too much personal information, first set boundaries. Avoid topics like past relationships. Focus on fun and playful dares rather than embarrassing or risky ones. Use the "skip" option if a truth question is too personal or uncomfortable.
